programme.title: Riserva Indiana
programme.desc: L'antilope scappa dal leone, si salva e torna a brucare. Noi, al contrario, rimuginiamo, ci perdiamo nel vortice dell'overthinking fino a farci venire la gastrite nervosa. Da Robert Sapolsky a Sarasvati, la dea del pensiero che scorre come l'acqua, impariamo che i pensieri vanno lasciati andare, non trattenuti. A Riserva Indiana, un viaggio tra scienza e saggezza antica, alla ricerca del segreto per non farci spegnere dal nostro stesso motore.

programme.title: Un posto al sole
programme.desc: Damiano è sempre più convinto di lasciare la polizia. Il confronto con un vecchio amico, gli farà cambiare idea? Ora che Matteo gli ha svelato i propositi di vendetta su Viola, Jimmy dovrà decidere come agire.

programme.title: Il coraggio di Blanche
programme.desc: Blanche Renard sogna l'amore e lo trova in Grégoire Lamoureux, affascinante sconosciuto che sembra l'uomo perfetto. Lo sposa e lascia la famiglia, ma lontana dalla Bretagna scopre un marito possessivo e manipolatore, che intreccia menzogne e ricatti, infrangendo il suo ideale romantico. La sua vita è in pericolo.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Unauthorized to enter the United States, an Eastern European (Tom Hanks) befriends a flight attendant (Catherine Zeta-Jones) while living in a New York airport.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Bridge
programme.desc: A rich Midwestern lawyer (Paul Newman), his wife (Joanne Woodward) and their children grow apart in the World War II era.

programme.title: Sex Life
programme.desc: Exploring one's wild side with animal role play; reconnecting with a troubled couple; clowning around with a surprising dominatrix.

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
programme.desc: Four men hijack a crowded subway train and threaten to murder one hostage for every minute the ransom demand is late.

programme.title: Danica
programme.desc: Racing superstar Danica Patrick reveals herself like never before: as a competitor preparing for her next race, a woman confidently considering when she wants to start a family and a budding mogul carefully considering thinking about her next steps.

programme.title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
programme.desc: Doc Holliday (Kirk Douglas) joins Wyatt Earp (Burt Lancaster) and his brothers for a Tombstone showdown with the Clanton gang.

programme.title: Overlord
programme.desc: Paratroopers drop behind enemy lines to penetrate a fortified church and destroy a Nazi transmitter. Making their way to an underground lab, the soldiers stumble upon a sinister experiment that forces them into a battle against an army of the undead.

programme.title: Mulholland Falls
programme.desc: An ex-lover's murder creates problems for the married head (Nick Nolte) of an elite police unit in early '50s Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: New York stockbroker Jordan Belfort, who founded brokerage firm Stratton Oakmont while still in his early 20s, develops habits of wretched excess and corruption.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Crime boss Vito Corleone (Marlon Brando) and his sons (Al Pacino, James Caan) rule their New York empire with Mafia justice.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) rules his father's criminal empire, while flashbacks recall young Vito's (Robert De Niro) climb to power.

programme.title: The Godfather, Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Dignified Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) joins his wild nephew in a Sicilian vendetta involving the Vatican.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Born and raised in Brooklyn, N.Y., Rob Christensen joins a crew and sells drugs to fit in; to escape that lifestyle, he joins the Air Force, goes to college and finds stand-up, a discovery that changes his life.

programme.title: Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: An uptight and by-the-book cop tries to protect the widow of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: Love Me
programme.desc: A buoy and a satellite meet online long after humanity's extinction. As they learn what life was like on Earth, they discover themselves and what it means to be alive and in love.

programme.title: Frida
programme.desc: Mexican painter Frida Kahlo (Salma Hayek) marries fellow artist Diego Rivera who shares her radical political views.

programme.title: Case 39
programme.desc: A social worker (Renée Zellweger) saves a girl (Jodelle Ferland) from abusive parents but finds there is more to the child than meets the eye.

programme.title: Love and Monsters
programme.desc: A young man and his traveling companions battle an array of monsters during an epic, 80-mile journey to find the woman he loves.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: Aliens, believing actors to be real heroes, enlist cast members of a sci-fi TV series to help save their people.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: In the midst of his daily commute, insurance salesman Michael MacCauley is contacted by a mysterious stranger who forces him to uncover the identity of a hidden passenger on the train before the last stop.

programme.title: Safe
programme.desc: A young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Pushed beyond their limits, three overworked and stressed-out mothers (Mila Kunis, Kristen Bell, Kathryn Hahn) go wild after ditching their daily routines.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Wild child Tanya looks to her buttoned-up, by-the-book sister Danica to help her get back on her feet. As these polar opposites collide, Tanya soon discovers that Danica's picture-perfect life and boyfriend may not be what they seem.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: A columnist (Kate Hudson) tries to make a man (Matthew McConaughey) dump her, but he bets his boss that she will fall in love.

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: Dexter: Resurrection
programme.desc: Charley's allegiance to Prater is pushed to its limit, forcing him to make a choice; Dexter and Harrison find themselves in a final confrontation, facing the consequences of their darkness.

programme.title: Boogie Nights
programme.desc: A producer (Burt Reynolds) guides a young man (Mark Wahlberg) to success in the 1970s porn industry, but greed and egotism lead to his downfall in the '80s.

programme.title: Halloween II
programme.desc: Laurie Strode struggles to come to terms with her brother Michael's deadly return to Haddonfield, Illinois; meanwhile, Michael prepares for another reunion with his sister.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
programme.desc: After an act of terrorism leaves him with a personal score to settle, Capt. Kirk (Chris Pine) defies Starfleet regulations and leads his crew (Zachary Quinto, Karl Urban, Zoë Saldana) on a mission to capture a powerfully destructive force.

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Nora and Hae Sung, two deeply connected childhood friends, are wrest apart after Nora's family emigrates from South Korea. Decades later, they are reunited for one fateful week as they confront destiny, love and the choices that make a life.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: The Night Clerk
programme.desc: A hotel clerk becomes the prime suspect when a woman is murdered during his shift. As the police investigation closes in, he makes a personal connection with a guest -- but soon realizes he must stop the killer before she becomes the next victim.

programme.title: Love Me
programme.desc: A buoy and a satellite meet online long after humanity's extinction. As they learn what life was like on Earth, they discover themselves and what it means to be alive and in love.

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: A young American in Paris works as a personal shopper for a celebrity. She seems to have the ability to communicate with spirits, like her recently deceased twin brother. Soon, she starts to receive ambiguous messages from an unknown source.

programme.title: Talk to Me
programme.desc: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits with an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill and high-stakes party game -- until one of them goes too far and unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.

programme.title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall
programme.desc: Young Remi has her future figured out, until she meets Barnes, who lives for the moment and makes her question everything. As their love story unfolds, she faces a choice -- stick to her plan or risk it all for a life she never saw coming.

programme.title: The Friend
programme.desc: Iris finds her comfortable New York City life thrown into disarray after her closest friend and mentor bequeaths her a Great Dane named Apollo. Yet as Iris finds herself unexpectedly bonding with Apollo, she begins to come to terms with her past.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Deaf man Daniel Brennan is leaving prison after ten isolating years inside and is now a man on a mission for revenge. Shunned by his parents and community, Brennan has nothing left to lose, until he is reunited with his estranged daughter, Carly.

programme.title: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: While in jail for murdering her husband (Bruce Greenwood), a woman (Ashley Judd) discovers he is living under a new identity with their son.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

programme.title: Becky
programme.desc: Spunky and rebellious Becky tries to reconnect with her father during a weekend getaway at a lakefront house. But the trip soon takes a turn for the worse when convicts on the run, led by the merciless Dominick, suddenly invade the home.

programme.title: Fear the Night
programme.desc: When masked intruders attack eight women at a remote farmhouse, Tess, a military veteran, leads them in a final stand as they fight back to save themselves and survive the night.
